MS_SubClass: Identifies the type of dwelling involved in the sale.
MS_Zoning: Identifies the general zoning classification of the sale.
Lot_Frontage: Linear feet of street connected to property
Street: Type of road access to property
Alley: Type of alley access to property
Neighborhood: Physical locations within Ames city limits (map available)
Condition_2: Proximity to various conditions (if more than one is present)
Overall_Qual: Rates the overall material and finish of the house
Overall_Cond: Rates the overall condition of the house
Year_Remod_Add: Remodel date (same as construction date if no remodeling or additions)
Exterior_2nd: Exterior covering on house (if more than one material)
Mas_Vnr_Area: Masonry veneer area in square feet
Exter_Qual: Evaluates the quality of the material on the exterior
Exter_Cond: Evaluates the present condition of the material on the exterior
Bsmt_Qual: Evaluates the height of the basement
Bsmt_Cond: Evaluates the general condition of the basement
Bsmt_Exposure: Refers to walkout or garden level walls
BsmtFin_Type_2: Rating of basement finished area (if multiple types)
Bsmt_Unf_SF: Unfinished square feet of basement area
Total_Bsmt_SF: Total square feet of basement area
Low_Qual_Fin_SF: Low quality finished square feet (all floors)
Gr_Liv_Area: Above grade (ground) living area square feet
Bedroom_AbvGr: Bedrooms above grade (does NOT include basement bedrooms)
TotRms_AbvGrd: Total rooms above grade (does not include bathrooms)
Functional: Home functionality (Assume typical unless deductions are warranted)
Garage_Cars: Size of garage in car capacity
Garage_Area: Size of garage in square feet
Wood_Deck_SF: Wood deck area in square feet
Open_Porch_SF: Open porch area in square feet
Enclosed_Porch: Enclosed porch area in square feet
Three_season_porch: Three season porch area in square feet
Screen_Porch: Screen porch area in square feet
Misc_Feature: Miscellaneous feature not covered in other categories
Age_by_Sale: Age of the house by the time of sale
Remod_Age: Time between sale year and remodel year
Total_Bath: Total number of bathrooms of the house
Total_Liv_Area: Total living area in square feet
Total_Flr_SF: Total area of all floors in square feet
Total_Porch_SF: Total porch area in square feet
Has_Second_Flr: Whether or not a house has 2nd floor, created based on Second_Flr_SF
Has_Bsmt: Whether or not a house has basement, created based on Total_Bsmt_SF
Has_Garage: Whether or not a house has garage, created based on Garage_Area
Has_MasVnr: Whether or not a house has masonry veneer, created based on Mas_Vnr_Area
Has_Low_Qual_Fin: Whether or not a house has low quality finished area, created based on Low_Qual_Fin_SF
Has_Wood_Deck: Whether or not a house has wood deck area, created based on Wood_Deck_SF
Has_Porch: Whether or not a house has porch area, created based on Total_Porch_SF
Has_Pool: Whether or not a house has pool, created based on Pool_Area
